Question: In 1957, Robert Mitchum asked this person to costar with him in Thunder Road, on which Mitchum was writer and producer.
Hints: "Way Down", this person's last single issued during his lifetime, came out on June 6.
Amidst mounting pressure in 1994, the ____ autopsy was reopened.
This person was by now performing in a jumpsuit, which would become a trademark of his live act.
